DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , fix dose , parallel design study evaluate effect semen characteristic 40 week daily dose 20 mg tadalafil .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Semen Characteristics After 9 Months Daily Tadalafil 20 mg
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject men mild erectile dysfunction At least 45 year age With specified semen characteristic . Certain chronic medical condition include cardiac disease , congestive heart failure , kidney liver disease , cancer HIV A history certain endocrine hormonal abnormality A history significant testicular/genital abnormality Any significant reproductive abnormality identify start study .
